channel.title: Comments on: Create Your Own Blend
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order‚Ñ¢

item.title: By: Jeremiah Weaver
item.dc:creator: Jeremiah Weaver
item.description: I have made 5 different blends through Cloud Chemistry, and each blend has been 100% top quality. I ALWAYS make my own blends because it's so unique to do it that way. 100% suggest to make your own blend, they allow up to 5 different flavors, try it out!
item.content:encoded: I have made 5 different blends through Cloud Chemistry, and each blend has been 100% top quality. I ALWAYS make my own blends because it’s so unique to do it that way. 100% suggest to make your own blend, they allow up to 5 different flavors, try it out!

item.title: By: dmdecker84
item.dc:creator: dmdecker84
item.description: Cloud Chemistry is great! Employees are friendly, place is nice and service is a-one! Love the fact I can get the mix of flavors I want with whatever nicotine I need. I won‚Äôt go anywhere else!
item.content:encoded: Cloud Chemistry is great! Employees are friendly, place is nice and service is a-one! Love the fact I can get the mix of flavors I want with whatever nicotine I need. I won‚Äôt go anywhere else!

item.title: By: Tasha Bertholf
item.dc:creator: Tasha Bertholf
item.description: I found this place by mistake, what a great place to get juice. I will never go any where else. I drive from NY to PA which is only 1 hour drive.
item.content:encoded: I found this place by mistake, what a great place to get juice. I will never go any where else. I drive from NY to PA which is only 1 hour drive.

item.title: By: lilgaito
item.dc:creator: lilgaito
item.description: This is the best product. I get menthol ice, 70/30. I like that I can make my own. This is the only store I buy from. I won't go to any other store.
item.content:encoded: This is the best product. I get menthol ice, 70/30. I like that I can make my own. This is the only store I buy from. I won’t go to any other store. üëçüëç

item.title: By: Tim Neece
item.dc:creator: Tim Neece
item.description: I can't tell you how much I love this flavor. Reminds me of when I used to smoke. Almost 6 years since I quit smoking. All the taste, none of the smelly smoke. I LOVE IT!
item.content:encoded: I can’t tell you how much I love this flavor. Reminds me of when I used to smoke. Almost 6 years since I quit smoking. All the taste, none of the smelly smoke. I LOVE IT!

item.title: By: Jim Wheaton
item.dc:creator: Jim Wheaton
item.description: I have been going here for about 5 years and absolutely love everything about it. They always have the best juice and products this is the only vape shop I will use
item.content:encoded:
I have been going here for about 5 years and absolutely love everything about it.
They always have the best juice and products this is the only vape shop I will use

item.title: By: Lauraml
item.dc:creator: Lauraml
item.description: My favorite blend and love the fast shipping! Team is super helpful and always ready with my order. Wish they had more shops in the area to make it easier to shop and pickup in person. But like I said, I am very happy with the shipping speed and delivery.
item.content:encoded: My favorite blend and love the fast shipping! Team is super helpful and always ready with my order. Wish they had more shops in the area to make it easier to shop and pickup in person. But like I said, I am very happy with the shipping speed and delivery.

item.title: By: Angelica Garibotto
item.dc:creator: Angelica Garibotto
item.description: Based on experience both in store and online, this business is very well run. I ordered juice a few times online since the pandemic started and shipping is super fast. I ordered a custom juice yesterday morning, and it got delivered to my mailbox today. This happened with my other flavors I've previously ordered too. I love the service I get both online and in store. As someone who works in retail myself excellent customer service all around. The new juice is exactly what i ordered. Keep up the great work.
item.content:encoded: Based on experience both in store and online, this business is very well run. I ordered juice a few times online since the pandemic started and shipping is super fast. I ordered a custom juice yesterday morning, and it got delivered to my mailbox today. This happened with my other flavors I’ve previously ordered too. I love the service I get both online and in store. As someone who works in retail myself excellent customer service all around. üëè The new juice is exactly what i ordered. Keep up the great work.

item.title: By: doneycarlie1
item.dc:creator: doneycarlie1
item.description: Love this for online ordering! So easy to type in the name you are looking for. Shipping is super quick also!! Painful Power has been my favorite lately, but there are so many good ones.
item.content:encoded: Love this for online ordering! So easy to type in the name you are looking for. Shipping is super quick also!! Painful Power has been my favorite lately, but there are so many good ones.

item.title: By: Ann Richardson
item.dc:creator: Ann Richardson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/shop/build-your-flavor/#comment-5658">Jesse Gregorio</a>.
So, I am in Kansas City and cannot find anything like this product. Nothing compares to the purity. I recently had an issue when I ordered 3 of my product and received only one. I called and the resolution was to send me more than what I ordered at no extra cost to me. Appreciate that service!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jesse Gregorio.

So, I am in Kansas City and cannot find anything like this product. Nothing compares to the purity. I recently had an issue when I ordered 3 of my product and received only one. I called and the resolution was to send me more than what I ordered at no extra cost to me. Appreciate that service!
